duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide engineering, design, analysis, cost estimates, and permitting for the construction of additions and modifications to the District’s distribution facilities.
Maintain a cursory understanding of all applicable governmental requirements, codes, industry standards, and internal policies.
Accountable for safety, reliability, operability, and economy of assigned projects.
Balance prudent design practices and customer expectations with a strong customer-service focus.
Focus on continuous improvement and development of job-related engineering, technical, and professional knowledge, skills, and performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering from an ABET-accredited program (Master's degree considered as additional experience)
